Title: Payback
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Norm Hiscock, Brigitte Liebowitz, Gabe Liedman (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (story editor), Matt O'Brien (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake goes to great lengths to keep Terry's secret from the rest of the precinct, and Amy gets her chance to partner up with captain Holt.
